comments: She was very patient with those that were not as fast of a learner as others. Took her time dissecting and teaching a subject that comes hard to a lot of people. Willing to help and responds immediately when you email questions. Very laid back. I would definitely recommend taking her class. I would say easy A but I don\'t like math.

comments: Very nice lady. I took her for College Algebra as a summer II class. She also teaches high school so she is fine with slowing down and reworking problems until everyone is on the same page. East to talk to and willing to help. She even changed due dates to give us more time to understand the topic.

comments: She is sweet and nice. However, her teaching skills are very poor. She doesn\'t lecture but just reads from the e-book. She has no structure what so ever. If your good at teaching yourself then I would take her but if not then look else where.

tag_professor: Caring (6)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Nice Teacher, but terrible teaching skills. I was familiar with the material so it was fairly easy for me. Teacher does not explain problems, and ask students what to do instead of her showing how to do it. I basicly tought myself using the homework. If you suck at math, dont take! But if u are familiar with it then go ahead!

tag_professor: Caring (6)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Ms. Patterson is by far the best math teacher I have ever had. I took her for both MATH 0350 (intermediate college algebra) and MATH 1314 (college algebra). Rather than just going through the textbook or a slide show like many teachers do she works through problems with the class. She is very helpful, always willing to work with you.

tag_professor: Caring (6)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Ms. Patterson is great, very laid-back approach to math. I like many of you am horrible at math. She is very willing to help and takes a lot of the stress off with her relaxed attitude. I have seen some lower scores for her on here, I think if your not willing to try then you will fail, that isn\'t on her. I have had 304 and 350 with her.

comments: All the glowing, positive review I read were true. Very helpful teacher. No questions is a dumb question. You won\'t regret taking her class!

comments: College Algebra Math 1314. She is a wonderful nice and sweet lady. She is very helpful and will go the extra mile to help you with anything you need help with in this class. She is by far the best math teacher I have ever had. She is willing to help you and understand college algebra. If you need help she will make it happen.

comments: I wouldn\'t advise to take her for 304.She DOES NOT GIVE TEST REVIEWS IN 304 CLASS. She may in others, but not 304. I failed the class and having to re-take. I found her to be too relaxed. Not cool. I have never failed anything before. I make only A\'s & B\'s, until now.

tag_professor: Caring (6)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I thought she was an AWESOME teacher. I don\'t know what\'s going on with all the negative reviews. YES, she did give a review, goes over the review, and gives the answers. And her tests are exactly like the review. Math isn\'t a breeze course you have to actually study! She has a great personality and is really chill. Love her!

tag_professor: Caring (6)  Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Run....IN 304 she doesn\'t give any test reviews at all. Yes, she is very nice, chilled out, but doesn\'t really teach. If you can teach yourself then one can take online instead, but if u need to be taught, she is not the one.

comments: She is very nice and has a real chill personality. I think if you read negative reviews about her you should keep a few things in mind.Math isn\'t always easy for some people, their ability to absorb it maybe at a slower pace than others. I think if just apply yourself you should do fine. In short, she is a pretty good teacher, I have had better
